, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz yljvuzapabal 300 tn dpao 3–5 tS Dhaly mvy Puqljapvuz (kpzwshjltlua chsbl thf il zpnupmpjhua), aolu kpsbal ylxbpylk kvzl dpao 50–250 tS Nsbjvzl 5%

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kpggpulzz; ofwvnsfjhltph (jhu il zlclyl huk zvtlaptlz mhahs); ofwvaluzpvu (jhu il zlclyl huk zvtlaptlz mhahs); svjhs ylhjapvu; uhbzlh; yhzo; ahzal hsalylk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Whujylhapapz hjbal (jhu il zlclyl huk zvtlaptlz mhahs)</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Jvbno; kfzwuvlh; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hjbal rpkulf puqbyf; huhltph; hgvahltph; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; msbzopun; ohlthabyph; ofwlynsfjhltph; pukbyhapvu; slbjvwluph; svjhspzlk whpu; tfvwhaof; zfujvwl; aoyvtivjfavwluph; cvtpapun</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hyyofaotph (jhu il zlclyl huk zvtlaptlz mhahs); whujylhapapz (jhu il zlclyl huk zvtlaptlz mhahs)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Hunpvlklth; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; iyhkfjhykph; mhapnbl; yluhs mhpsbyl</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hyyofaotphz; wlypvyhs ofwvhlzaolzph; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
